# LLMs.txt for 1Mind Labs


## Website Overview

1Mind Labs is a student-led team focused on agentic AI, machine learning, and full-stack development. Single-page React application showcasing our team, projects, and achievements.


## Site Structure

- Hero (`/#`): Landing section with branding and social links
- Projects (`/#projects`): 10+ hackathon projects with expandable details
- Team (`/#team`): 20+ team members across various tech domains


## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 19, TypeScript 5.8, Vite 6.2
- Styling: Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Icons: Lucide React


## Contact Information

- Email: `hello@1mindlabs.org`
- GitHub: `https://github.com/1MindLabs`
- Twitter: `@1MindLabs`
